TIMAPSend.SelectROFolder
TIMAPSend     

function SelectROFolder(FolderName: string): Boolean;

Unit
IMAPsend

Description
Select folder, but only for reading. Any changes is not allowed!


See also:
CloseFolder, CopyMess, DeleteMess, ExpungeFolder, FetchHeader, FetchMess, GetFlagsMess, CheckFolder, MessageSize, SearchMess, SelectedCount, SelectedFolder, SelectedRecent, SelectedUIDvalidity, SelectFolder, SetFlagsMess
